name: hallway
story: One day you wake up and go out of your room and find yourself in a hallway that has doors on both sides with numbers printed on them.
nav: Press 1 to go to room 1| Press 2 to go to room 2| Press 3 to go back to your room and sleep while awaiting this weird dream to end.

name: Room 1
story: You are in room 1, there is a tiger in the room.
nav: Press 1 to run back to hallway|Press 2 to run and enter any door|Press 3 to run back to your room, the way you came from.

name: Room 2
story: You are in room 2, there are weird paintings in the room.
nav: Press 1 to enter left door|Press 2 to enter right door|Press 3 to enter the middle door.

name: Room 3
story: You are in room 3, a girl with no head is crying in the corner.
nav: Press 1 to run back to hallway|Press 2 to enter the door opposite to her|Press 3 to enter previous door

name: Room 4
story: You are in room 4, Professor Sidney is giving you more homework
nav: Press 1 to run back to the previous room|Press 2 to take the homework|Press 3 to ignore him and enter any door.

name: Room 5
story: You are in room 5, there is a weird man standing and staring at you
nav: Press 1 to talk to him|Press 2 to run away|Press 3 to enter any door beside him

name: Room 6
story: You are in room 6, there is nothing in this room
nav: Press 1 to enter left door|Press 2 to enter right door|Press 3 to enter the middle door.

name: Room 7
story: You are in room 7, there is a board on the wall. It says nowhere to run.
nav: Press 1 to clean the board|Press 2 to ignore and enter right door|Press 3 to enter left door.

name: Room 8
story: You are in room 8, there is a big balloon in this room.
nav: Press 1 to take the balloon|Press 2 to enter the left door|Press 3 to enter the right door.

name: Room 9
story: You are in room 9, there's a clown in this room who doesn't care about your presence.
nav: Press 1 to talk to him|Press 2 to Enter left door|Press 3 to enter right room.

name: Room 10
story: You are in room 10, there are ninja turtles eating pizza in the room.
nav: Press 1 to ask for pizza|Press 2 to ask for help|Press 3 to ignore them and enter the next room.

name: Room 11
story: You are in room 11, there is nothing in this room.
nav: Press 1 to go back|Press 2 to enter left door|Press 3 to enter right door.

name: Room 12
story: You are in room 12, you asked them for pizza and suddenly Professor Sidney jump out in front of you. He tells you that he was sitting with the turtle disguised and judging you for bravery and you passed. You had the guts of asking ninja turtles for pizza. You won! You are back at your home now.

name: Room 13
story: You are in room 13, you asked ninja turtles for help and they sent you here. This is another boring ending where you win and find a door back to your home.

name: Room 14
story: What kind of a person tries to talk to a clown who's ignoring him? Professor Sidney is dissappointed in you. You lose the game! (P.s. - And this is room 14 by the way.)

name: Room 15
story: You are in room 15, you dared and opened the door and teleported back to your room. Professor Sidney who waiting for you there tells you "Congratulations you won!".

name: Room 16
story: You are in room 16, you teleported here after you tried to speak to the weird man in room 5.
nav: Press 1 to enter left door|Press 2 to enter right door|Press 3 to enter the middle door.

name: Room 17
story: You are in room 17, you teleported here after you touched the balloon and won! Professor Sindey sent is regards.

name: Room 18
story: You are in room 18, nothing to see here, just a cat sitting and meowing.
nav: Press 1 to enter left door|Press 2 to enter right door|Press 3 to enter the middle door.

name: Room 19
story: You are in room 19, you see a door that says don't open.
nav: Press 1 to agree and leave the room back|Press 2 to disagree and open the door|Press 3 to enter the left door.

name: Room 20
story: You are in room 20, you teleported here after you touched the extra homework from Professor Sidney. You have the homework in your hand and it's a message from Professor Sidney which says "Ha! You took the extra homework I gave you and proved yourself as a brave person." You have won the game!

name: home
story: You were chickening out and are back in your room. You have lost the game!
